settings.title: Material
settings.content:
18K Gold PVD:

Zotic uses REAL 18K GOLD, that covers with 3 microns of gold,18K gold PVD is the closest thing to soild gold in looks and weight, it beats gold plating by a home run!

Does not tarnish, or fade guaranteed!

Any questions? feel free to contact us

support@zoticnewyork.com

settings.title: Warranty & Returns
settings.content:
WARRANTY

All of our products are covered with Lifetime warranty. If our jewelry shows any signs of tarnish, we will replace it free of charge.

RETURNS

Our returns window are 30 days.

You may return any unwanted products to us and receive a full refund. Read about our returns policy.

USPS Express Tracked Insured Shipping (2-5 Days): Free for orders above $100

USPS Tracked Shipping (5-8 Days): Free

﻿

Please give us up to 24-48 hours to ship out

﻿

<style><!--
p {
font-size: 14px;
}
.collapsible {
  font-size: 12px;
  letter-spacing: 2px;
  color: black;
  cursor: pointer;
  padding: 18px 0px 18px 0px;
  width: 100% !important;;
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgb(0,0,0,0.15);
  text-align: left;
  outline: none;
  width: 100%;
  font-weight: bold;
text-indent: 7%;
}

.active, .collapsible:hover {

}

.content {
  padding: 0 18px;
  display: none;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: #f8faf9;
}
  
.collapsible:after {
  padding-right: 6%;
  content: '\02795'; 
  color: white;
  float: right;
  margin-left: 5px;
}

.active:after {
  content: "\2796"; /* Unicode character for "minus" sign (-) */
padding-right: 6%;
}
--></style>
<script>
var coll = document.getElementsByClassName("collapsible");
var i;

for (i = 0; i < coll.length; i++) {
  coll[i].addEventListener("click", function() {
    this.classList.toggle("active");
    var content = this.nextElementSibling;
    if (content.style.display === "block") {
      content.style.display = "none";
    } else {
      content.style.display = "block";
    }
  });
}
  coll[0].click();


</script>

settings.paragraph1:
Zotic solid gold chains are handcrafted with precision, signifying their exceptional quality.

These radiant chains have an unmistakable allure and proudly bear a clearly engraved 10k/14k/18k stamp on the clasp, assuring their authenticity and instilling confidence.
settings.paragraph2: The Zotic clasp is a perfect mix of design and technology. Thinner pieces are equipped with a single clasp for a sleek, secure design, while thicker pieces boast a lift clasp for maximum security. Both prevent accidental openings, while remaining easy to use and comfortable to wear.
settings.paragraph3:
What does this warranty cover?

- Any defects in materials used to manufacture your product

- Any defects in workmanship under normal use

- Any broken components under normal use

What will we do to correct any problems?

- Repair the product at no cost

- Repair any broken parts of a product using new or replacement parts

settings.heading: SOLID GOLD
settings.modal-desc:
Zotic solid gold chains are handcrafted with precision, signifying their exceptional quality. 

These radiant chains have an unmistakable allure and proudly bear a clearly engraved 10k/14k/18k stamp on the clasp, assuring their authenticity and instilling confidence.

settings.heading: SECURE CLASP
settings.modal-desc: The Zotic clasp is a perfect mix of design and technology. Thinner pieces are equipped with a single clasp for a sleek, secure design, while thicker pieces boast a lift clasp for maximum security. Both prevent accidental openings, while remaining easy to use and comfortable to wear.

TRUSTED FOR A REASON

settings.liquid:
<script type="text/javascript">
var _learnq = _learnq || [];
function addedToCart() {
  fetch(`${window.location.origin}/cart.js`)
  .then(res => res.clone().json().then(data => {
    var cart = {
      total_price: data.total_price/100,
      $value: data.total_price/100,
      total_discount: data.total_discount,
      original_total_price: data.original_total_price/100,
      items: data.items
    }
    if (item !== 'undefined') {
      cart = Object.assign(cart, item)
    }
    _learnq.push(['track', 'Added to Cart', cart])
  }))
} 
(function (ns, fetch) {
  ns.fetch = function() {
    const response = fetch.apply(this, arguments);
    response.then(res => {
      if (`${window.location.origin}/cart/add.js`
          .includes(res.url)) {
            addedToCart()
      }
    });
    return response
  }
}(window, window.fetch))
$(document).ajaxComplete(function(event, request, settings){
  if(settings.url == "/cart/add.js"){
      addedToCart()
  }
})</script>
